name: Food Sharing
description: This platform aims to reduce food waste by connecting donors with those in need, serving as a bridge for sharing surplus food in the community.

name: Movie Portal
description: The Movie Portal is a user-friendly platform for exploring, adding, and managing movies, offering robust features and a responsive design for movie enthusiasts.

name: Unknown Project
description: A full-stack single-page car repair web app where people can take and book services. Login system with Firebase and private routes.
